section-quote-head: Inketho eneendleko ezisebenzayo kumashishini ezithuthi eziphezulu
section-quote-text: Ekugqibeleni, enye into ethembekileyo kuGoogle. IShishini le-hCaptcha lizisa ulondolozo olumangalisayo kwibhili yakho ye-reCAPTCHA ngokhuseleko oluphezulu: ukuya kuthi ga kwi-80% ngaphantsi kwexabiso eliphantsi kwezinye iimeko. Uninzi lweenkonzo ze-intanethi ezinkulu zehlabathi zitshintshele kwiShishini le-hCaptcha kwaye zafumana ukubonwa kwebhot ephuculweyo ecaleni kogcino lweendleko.
section-privacy-text-1: Uthungelwano lwentengiso lubona iindwendwe zakho njengemveliso. Kithina imveliso kuphela imisela ubuntu babo. Iinkonzo zethu ziyahlangabezana okanye zigqithise iimfuno ze-GDPR, CCPA, kunye ne-LGPD, kunye nenkxaso yamalinge anje ngePasi yaBucala. Sisebenza nzima ukulungelelanisa ubumfihlo kunye nokhuseleko.
section-privacy-text-2: Olu gqaliso lukhethekileyo kubumfihlo luthetha ukuba sinokunikezela ngokugcina idatha yomntu ngamnye, ukusebenza ngaphandle kweekuki, kunye nezinye iziqinisekiso zabucala zekhontrakthi njengoko zifuneka ngelixa sigcina ukhuseleko olubalaseleyo.
section-security-text-1: Ukuchaneka kunomdla wakho kunye nowethu. I-hCaptcha isebenza ukukunika idatha yangempela kwaye ikuvumela ukuba wenze isigqibo sokuba uyisebenzise njani. Ezinye ii-captchas zibonelelwa ziinkampani zentengiso zeGigantic. Oku kuthetha ukuba yonke ibhoti abayivimbayo inokunciphisa ingeniso yabo.
section-security-text-2: Ukusebenzisa iindlela zamva nje zokufunda ngoomatshini ngokugxila kubumfihlo kusenza sigqithe imigangatho yokhuseleko yerekhodi yelifa yonke amaqhinga anaphakade ngaphandle kokonakalisa ukhuseleko okanye ubumfihlo bomsebenzisi.
section-user-experience-text1: Kubasebenzisi boShishino, iinketho ziyafumaneka ukuze uphephe ngokupheleleyo imiceli mngeni kwiimeko ezininzi.
section-user-experience-text2: Yehlisa ingxabano ngokunqanda umngeni ngokupheleleyo kwi-99.9% yetrafikhi yakho esemthethweni ngelixa usabonelela ngokhuseleko olugqwesileyo, enkosi kwiimodeli eziphambili ze-bot.
section-easy-integration-text: Ukongeza i-hCaptcha kuthatha imizuzu kuphela kunye nemigca embalwa yekhowudi. I-API esisiseko iyahambelana ne-reCAPTCHA V2, kwaye kuthatha imizuzu kuphela ukuyitshintsha. Ungavuka kwaye usebenze ngenye indlela ephezulu namhlanje, kwaye uvule izinto eziphucukileyo njengoko kuyimfuneko.
section-threat-text: Ayizizo zonke iingxaki ezifanayo: ukufumana inqaku elinye kuthetha ukuba kufuneka ukujongana neemfuno zakho ukuze ube luncedo. Ngamanqaku akhethekileyo e-hCaptcha aCwangcisiweyo aKhethekileyo, uthethwano olukhawulezayo lusivumela ukuba silungise iimodeli zethu ukuhambisa amanqaku afanelekileyo kwishishini lakho.
section-challenges-text-2: Xa abasebenzisi kufuneka basombulule umceli mngeni ukuhlangabezana neemfuno zokhuseleko, kutheni ungenzi imisebenzi eyolisayo nefanelekileyo kumsebenzisi? Ngomyili wethu olula womngeni, unokwazisa umxholo womngeni kwibrand kwimizuzu nje embalwa.
section-integration-text: Inkqubo yoShishino lwe-hCaptcha iguquguquka ngokukodwa kwi-design yayo: inokuthi ifakwe ngokuyinxenye okanye ngokupheleleyo kumda womnatha wakho ukuba usebenzisa ifu likawonkewonke okanye unamaziko amaninzi edatha. Oku kunokunciphisa kakhulu iindleko kunye nokugcwala ngaphandle kwenethiwekhi ngelixa sigcina zonke izibonelelo zolawulo ngabasebenzi bethu abangama-24/7 abafowunelayo ukuhlangabezana nezona SLA zingqongqo.
section-support-header: Ubuchwephesha obufikelelekayo kunye neNkxaso kubo bobabini kunye nabasebenzisi bakho
section-support-text: Inkonzo yeyona nto iphambili kuthi. Sigcina inkxaso ye-24/7 ekufowuneni kwaye sinikezela ngolungelelwaniso oluthe ngqo lwe-Slack kunye neqela lakho lokudibanisa lobunjineli kunye nabasebenzi bethu abafowunelayo ngexesha nasemva kokuphunyezwa. ‍ sikwazimisele ekubekeni iliso ngenkuthalo nasekuphenduleni imibuzo yabasebenzisi bakho kumajelo eendaba ezentlalo, iiforam. , kunye ne-widget yethu kunye neendlela zenkxaso ye-imeyile. Siyafikeleleka kwaye siyaphendula, kwaye siphatha ukwaneliseka kwabasebenzisi njenge-KPI ephezulu.
section-enterprise-desc-2: Khangela abadlali abangalunganga beentlobo ezininzi ezahlukeneyo.
section-enterprise-title-3: I-Zero friction kunye ne-99.9% yeendlela zokwenziwa
section-enterprise-desc-3: Cela umngeni ngaphantsi kwe-0.1% yabasebenzisi abasemthethweni.
section-enterprise-desc-4: Ithala leencwadi elibanzi leentlobo onokukhetha kuzo.
section-enterprise-desc-5: Hlala kwi-brand kunye namava omsebenzisi angaguqukiyo.
section-enterprise-desc-6: Ukuthembeka okuqinisekisiweyo kunye nokukhawuleza kwe-24/7 kwi-call-call support.
section-enterprise-desc-7: Iyahambelana yonke indlela ebuyela kwi-Internet Explorer 8.
section-enterprise-desc-8: Bona okwenzekayo kuzo zonke iisayithi zakho kunye nee-apps.
section-enterprise-title-10: GDPR, CCPA, kunye LGPD-friendly umgaqo-nkqubo wabucala
section-enterprise-desc-10: Yenzelwe ubumfihlo ukusuka kusuku lokuqala. IsiVumelwano esinamandla sokuCwangciswa kweDatha.
section-enterprise-desc-11: Cofa oku ukuze ulungele imeko yakho yosetyenziso.
section-enterprise-desc-12: Zonke izicelo kunye ne-asethi ziya ku-hcaptcha.yourdomain.com
section-enterprise-desc-14: I-0ms latency: qinisekisa iithokheni ze-hCaptcha ngaphandle kwefowuni ye-API.
section-enterprise-desc-15: Amava angenamthungo kuyo yonke iwebhu, iselula yemveli, iwebhu ehambayo. Udibaniso olwakhiwe kwangaphambili kunye nee-SDK zomthonyama ezikhoyo.
section-enterprise-desc-16: Ukwanelisa iimfuno zakho zomthetho xa ezinye iinkampani zingakwazi.
presented-challenges-subheader: ...kunye neminye imisebenzi elula. Kulula ebantwini, kunzima kwi-bots.
intro-subtitle-p1-privacy: Indlela ekhethekileyo eqhutywa ngasese kukhuseleko lwe-intanethi.
info-text-1-pr: I-hCaptcha Enterprise inenjongo enye kuphela: ukukhusela abadlali ababi ukuba baphazamise imisebenzi yakho ye-intanethi kunye nokwenzakalisa abasebenzisi bakho.
info-text-2-pr: Iisistim zethu ke ngoko ziyilwe ukusuka phantsi ukuze zicuthe ukuqokelelwa kwedatha kunye nokugcinwa ngelixa sigcina ukhuseleko olukhokela udidi. Eyona ndlela yokukhusela idatha yomsebenzisi ayikugcini konke konke.
info-text-3-pr: Bonke ubudlelwane babathengi bukwakhuselwe siSivumelwano esiqinileyo sokuCwangciswa kweDatha. Inkonzo ye-hCaptcha ithobela yonke imithetho yabucala kungakhathaliseki ukuba inkonzo yakho okanye abathengi bakho bahlala phi. Ukungagcini idatha yobuqu kwenza oku kube lula kuthi kunezinye iinkampani.
info-text-2-2-pr: Iinkonzo ezifana ne-reCAPTCHA v3 zithi ukubeka i-pixel yabo yokulandela umkhondo kwiphepha ngalinye lesayithi yakho kuyimfuneko kukhuseleko olulungileyo. Oku akunjalo.
info-text-2-3-pr: Uhlalutyo olulula lokuziphatha luphawu oluyilwe lula ngabadlali abangalunganga, kwaye lufuna ukugcina imbali yokukhangela kuyo yonke itrafikhi yakho esemthethweni.
info-text-2-4-pr: Asisebenzisi inethiwekhi yentengiso, kwaye asinamdla ekujongeni indlela oziphethe ngayo umsebenzisi ukuze ubathengisele iintengiso. Oku kuthetha ukuba asifuni pixels yokwenziwa kwiphepha ngalinye lesayithi yakho.
info-text-2-5-pr: Yongeza ikhowudi yethu yomngeni kuphela apho iyimfuneko, kwaye apho kunengqiqo ukukhusela wena kunye nabasebenzisi bakho.
info-head-3-pr: Ukufunda ngoomatshini kuluncedo. Kodwa ayifuni idatha yomntu ukuba isebenze.
info-text-3-1-pr: Ukufunda ngoomatshini ngoku kuchaphazela phantse zonke iinkalo zobomi bethu, rhoqo ngeendlela esingaziqondiyo nesingaziboniyo. Iinkonzo zokhuseleko kwi-Intanethi azifani.
info-text-3-2-pr: Ngokufunda ngaphezulu kwamawaka emiqondiso, iimodeli zinokufikelela kwaye zifikelele kukuzithemba okuphezulu ekubhaqeni impatho ekhohlakeleyo ngokukhawuleza, nokuba akukho phawu lomntu lunokomelela ngokwaneleyo ukubonisa ingxaki.
info-text-3-3-pr: Nangona kunjalo, akukho nanye koku efuna ukuba kusetyenziswe iinkcukacha ezichongiweyo (personal dentifiable information) (PII). Iindlela zanamhlanje ze-cryptographic zisivumela ukuba silahle nayiphi na idatha yobuqu ngokukhawuleza, sidale imisayino yendlela enye engenako ukudityaniswa kuye nawuphi na umntu.
info-text-3-4-pr: Uqeqesho kwidatha engachongwayo lusebenza ngokunjalo, kwaye aludingi kuthotywa silahleko nokuba kukhuseleko okanye ubumfihlo. Abathengi bethu benze iimvavanyo zobungqina, kwaye basibhengeze ukuba silingana okanye singcono kuneendlela ezingaphantsi zabucala.
cloudflare-quote-text-privacy: Sithande izinto ezininzi malunga nezisombululo ze-hCaptcha: 1) abathengisi idatha yomntu; baqokelela kuphela ubuncinci bedatha yobuqu efunekayo, babonakala elubala ekuchazeni ulwazi abaluqokelelayo kunye nendlela abalusebenzisa ngayo kunye/okanye baluveze.
pilot-text-1a: Siziinjineli, hayi abathengisi: sifuna ukuba wonwabe ngokukhetha kwakho.
pilot-text-1b: Eyona ndlela yokuqinisekisa ukwaneliseka kwakho kukubonisa ukuba siyahlangabezana neemfuno zakho.
pilot-text-1c: Phantse zonke iinkampani eziqala umqhubi wenqwelomoya ekugqibeleni zikhetha izisombululo zethu.
pilot-text-1d: Sebenzisa le fomu ukufikelela kwenye yeengcali zethu zobugcisa. Siphendula ngokukhawuleza.
pilot-f5: Naziphi ezinye iinkcukacha esifanele sibe nazo?
pilot-f10: Ngokufaka i-imeyile yakho, uyavumelana neMigqaliselo yethu kunye nePolisi yaBucala, kunye nokufumana i-imeyile evela kuthi.
pilot-fo-2: I-hCaptcha inamaninzi okudibanisa okwakhiwa kwangaphambili kwi-frontend kunye ne-backend systems oyisebenzisayo.
pilot-fo-3: Ukuba uvela kwi-reCAPTCHA kaGoogle, ii-APIs zethu ziindawo zokulahla. Imigca emithathu yekhowudi yiyo yonke into oyifunayo.
pilot-fo-4: Iinjineli zethu zokukhwela zingenza ukuba uhambe ngokukhawuleza, nokuba ufuna udibaniso lweReact, ii-SDKs ze-iOS zokusebenza zemveli, umzekelo we-Java backend, okanye phantse nayiphi na enye imeko.
pilot-fo-5: Kwaye njengesiqhelo, ubumfihlo lixabiso elingundoqo kuthi. Yongeza ikhowudi yethu yomngeni kuphela apho iyimfuneko, kwaye apho kunengqiqo ukukhusela wena kunye nabasebenzisi bakho. Ukunciphisa ukuqokelelwa kwedatha kuqala ukusuka kumzuzu wokudibanisa.
home-ent-2-new: Funda ngakumbi malunga nesisombululo sethu seshishini.
home-main-plans2-new: Izisombululo zeShishini le-hCaptcha zihambisa ukhuseleko oluphambili lweklasi kwaye zikhusela uninzi lweenkonzo eziphezulu ze-intanethi.
about-advisors-brendan: Umphathi omkhulu weBrave. Umququzeleli weMozilla. Umdali wolwimi lwenkqubo yeJavaScript. Umakhi wezikhangeli kunye nokunye.
about-advisors-dawn: UNjingalwazi, CS kwiYunivesithi yaseCalifornia, eBerkeley. Ukufunda okunzulu, ukhuseleko, ingcali ye-blockchain. CEO yeOasis Labs.
about-advisors-keiran: Inzululwazi yoPhando eStanford. Ukufunda ngomatshini kunye nobungakanani bemali kwiibhanki ezinkulu, iingxowa zemali, kunye nezifundo.
about-content-text-1a: I-hCaptcha izisa indlela yanamhlanje, ejolise kubucala yokumisa i-bots.
about-content-text-1b: Sibonisa imiceli mingeni yeCAPTCHA enzima kwi-bots kodwa kulula ebantwini ngokuqokelela idatha enzima-kwelebheli kwiingxaki zokufunda ngomatshini, kwaye siyisebenzise ukwahlula ukuba iwebhusayithi okanye undwendwe lweapp ngabantu.
about-content-text-2a: Abadlali ababi baya besanda kwi-Intanethi. Kodwa ukuncama ubumfihlo bomsebenzisi akuyiyo impendulo.
about-content-text-2b: Izisombululo zokhuseleko ezinikezelwa ziinkampani zentengiso zijolise ikakhulu kubasebenzisi bokulandela umkhondo kwiwebhu yonke. Senze isisombululo esisebenzayo sokhuselo esingqina ukonakalisa ubumfihlo bomsebenzisi akuyomfuneko ukuhambisa iziphumo ezilungileyo.
about-intro-text: I-hCaptcha yeyona nkonzo izimeleyo yeCAPTCHA isetyenziswa kakhulu kwihlabathi.
about-leadership-headsub: Iqela elinamava, elisebenza kwezona ngxaki zinzima namhlanje.
about-leadership-text1: Sigxile ekufundeni nzulu nasekufundeni komatshini wedomeyini ebonakalayo kwinqanaba, kugxilwe ngakumbi ekufumaneni iinkqubo ze-Intanethi kwizisongelo eziya zisiba mbinje.
about-leadership-text2: Ngamashumi eminyaka esoftware kunye nobuchule bokufunda ngomatshini, sakha kwaye sisebenzise iinkqubo ezinobunzima bokujongana nezinye zeengxaki ezinzima namhlanje ngelixa sigcina ubumfihlo.
acc-opt-text: Ngaba unengxaki yokubona okanye awukwazanga ukuyigqiba i-hCaptchas?
appreciate-in: Siyalibulela igalelo lakho. Sazise nayiphi na imiba kwaye siza kuyisombulula ngokukhawuleza.
footer-copyright-text: I-hCaptcha luphawu lwentengiso olubhalisiweyo lwe-Intuition Machines, Inc.
home-about-text-1: I-hCaptcha yenzelwe ukusombulula eyona ngxaki inzima ekusetyenzisweni komatshini: ukufaka iileyibhile kwisixa esikhulu sedatha ngexesha elifanelekileyo, elifikelelekayo nelithembekileyo.
home-about-text-2: Idatha engaphezulu ngokubanzi ivelisa iziphumo ezingcono kwiimodeli zokufunda ngomatshini. Impumelelo yamva nje yeemodeli ezinzulu zikhokelele kwiseti yedatha enkulu ngakumbi, phantse ngalo lonke ixesha kuvavanyo lomntu. Nangona kunjalo, ukwenza iidathabheyisi ezinkulu ezijongwe ngabantu ngeMechanical Turk, uMzobo wesibhozo, njl.njl. Ziyacotha kwaye ziyabiza.
home-about-text-3: I-hCaptcha ivumela iiwebhusayithi ukuba zenze imali zisebenze le mfuno ngelixa zithintela i-bots kunye nezinye iindlela zokuphathwa gadalala.
home-about-text-4: Indawo yentengiso ye-hCaptcha ixhotyiswe yi-HUMAN Protocol, inkqubo evulekileyo egunyazisiweyo yokuphononongwa komntu eqhuba kwi-Ethereum blockchain. Iiwebhusayithi zifumana iiTokheni zaBantu (HMT) nanini na xa abasebenzisi besebenzisa iwijethi ye-hCaptcha kwindawo yabo, kwaye iinkampani ezifunda ngomatshini zihlawula amaTokheni aBantu ukuze zifumaneke ukuba zibhalwe idatha.
home-benefits-text-1: Ngaba uqaphele ukuba ngalo lonke ixesha ucofa imoto unceda ukuqeqesha iinkqubo zokufunda ngomatshini zeGigantic simahla?
home-benefits-text-2: hCaptcha ijika le modeli ijikeleze. Xa usebenzisa i-hCaptcha, iinkampani zibhida emsebenzini owenziwa ngabasebenzisi bakho njengoko bengqina ubuntu babo. Ufumana umvuzo.
home-benefits-text-3: Ngaba ufuna ukubuyisela kwisisa sakho osithandayo? I-hCaptcha ikuvumela ukuba uxhase izibonelelo zesisa ozikhethileyo kunye nomvuzo owufumanayo ngokuwusebenzisa. Abasebenzisi abakwisiza sakho kungekudala baya kuba nakho ukubona igalelo lakho kwisisa ngokwenza uphawu ngokuqonda kwi-hCaptcha interface.
home-challenges-text-1: ... kunye neminye imisebenzi elula. Kulula ebantwini, kunzima kwi-bots.
home-ent-2: Ndwendwela indawo yethu entsha ezinikeleyo: BotStop.com
home-intro-body: Ngaba usebenzisa i-captcha ukugcina i-bots? I-hCaptcha ikhusela ubumfihlo bomsebenzisi, iyavuza amawebhusayithi, kwaye inceda iinkampani ukuba zifumane iilebhile zedatha yazo. Kukutshintsha endaweni ye-reCAPTCHA: ungatshintsha ngaphakathi kwemizuzu.
home-intro-head: Misa ezinye i-bots. Qala ukukhusela imfihlo yomsebenzisi.
home-main-1: Bucala. Khuselekile. Ngesantya. Kwaye siyakuhlawula ukuba uyisebenzise.
home-main-2c: Uthungelwano lwentengiso lubona iindwendwe zakho njengemveliso. Kwi-hCaptcha imveliso ngumsebenzi ababonelela ngawo. Asikhathali nokuba ngoobani na abasebenzisi bakho, kuphela ukuba kunokwenzeka kangakanani ukuba babe nonya. Siyawaxhasa amaphulo afana nePrivacy Pass, kwaye sisebenza nzima ukulinganisa ubumfihlo kunye nokhuseleko.
home-main-3c: Ukuchaneka kumdla wakho nakuthi. I-hCaptcha ijolise kumshicileli. Sisebenza ukukunika idatha yokwenyani kwaye masikwenze uthathe isigqibo sokuyisebenzisa. Ezinye ii-captchas zibonelelwa ziinkampani zentengiso zeGigantic. Oku kuthetha ukuba yonke i-bot abayivimbileyo inokunciphisa ingeniso yabo.
home-main-4c: Iimodeli zokufunda ngomatshini ezintsonkothileyo zisetyenziswa yi-hCaptcha ukumisela ubuntu. Oku kusivumela ukuba sifune imisebenzi engacaphukisi kubasebenzisi bakho kwaye sithathe ixesha labo lincinci ngokwenza njalo, ngelixa sivelisa idatha efanelekileyo enelebheli yokulebhelisha abathengi.
home-main-plans: I-hCaptcha isimahla ukuba isetyenziselwe abapapashi bawo nabuphi na ubungakanani. Nangona kunjalo, kumashishini nakumaqonga afuna ulawulo ngakumbi, izisombululo zethu zeshishini ziyafumaneka.
home-main-plans2: Isisombululo seshishini seHCaptcha sikhusela izigidi zabasebenzisi kumashumi ezigidi zewebhusayithi kwezinye zeenkampani ezinkulu emhlabeni. Nceda unxibelelane nathi ngolwazi oluthe kratya, okanye undwendwele
home-main-plans3: Isisombululo seshishini seHCaptcha sikhusela izigidi zabasebenzisi kumashumi ezigidi zewebhusayithi kwezinye zeenkampani ezinkulu emhlabeni. Nceda unxibelelane nathi ngolwazi oluthe kratya, okanye undwendwele
home-try-it-out-text: I-hCaptcha ibonelela ngokulula, ngokulula, nangokuthembekileyo kokubhaqwa kwe-bot ngelixa kuyinto encinci ebantwini ukuba bayisombulule.
labeling-about-text-1: I-hCaptcha yenzelwe ukusombulula eyona ngxaki inzima kwimisebenzi yokufunda komatshini; ilebheli yemali eninzi ngexesha elifanelekileyo, elifikelelekayo, nelithembekileyo. Idatha engaphezulu ngokubanzi ivelisa iziphumo ezingcono kwiimodeli zokufunda ngomatshini. Impumelelo yamva nje yeemodeli ezinzulu zikhokelele kwisiseko sedatha enkulu, kwaye i-hCaptcha isebenza le mfuno.
labeling-about-text-2: Nangona kunjalo, ukudala iiseti zedatha ezinkulu eziqwalaselwe ngabantu zisebenzisa iindlela zesiko kuhamba kancinci kwaye kuyabiza. I-hCaptcha yindlela yeenkampani yokufumana izichazi abazifunayo ngokukhawuleza, ngomgangatho ophezulu kunye neendleko eziphantsi kunezinye iindlela.
labeling-annotations-text-3: Chaza izichazi ezininzi zamatyala ohlukeneyo okusetyenziswa
labeling-annotations-text-4: Hlela okanye hlomela iindidi zokuchasana nabuphi na ubungakanani
labeling-annotations-text-6: Ngaba ufuna olunye uhlobo olungadweliswanga apha? Sibuze nje.
labeling-ent-text-1: Iqonga leHUMAN ngasemva kweHCaptcha ibonelela ngomgangatho ophucukileyo womsebenzi kunye neempawu zolawulo ngokusebenzisa indawo, i-hybrid, okanye ukuhanjiswa kwe-SaaS okudibanisa neenkqubo zakho ezikhoyo.
labeling-ent-text-2: Sebenzisa ngokupheleleyo ngaphandle kweintanethi kunye nabasebenzi bakho, ukulandelela ixabiso elityelweyo kwiiyunithi zeshishini okanye amaqabane e-Consortium, ngokukhetha indlela yendlela eya kubanikezeli babasebenzi bangaphakathi okanye bangaphandle ngokusekwe kwiindleko kunye neemfuno zokhuseleko, kunye nokunye.
labeling-ent-text-3: Ukufikelela okulula kwe-API, iideshibhodi ezintle, kunye nemodeli yetekhnoloji yakutshanje yokwenza imodeli yokunyusa ukusebenza ngokukuko.
labeling-ent-text-4: I-99.99% ye-SLAs kunye ne-24/7 yenkxaso yehlabathi ekhoyo. Ngolwazi oluthe kratya:
labeling-features-head-2: Ilungiselelwe iindleko kunye nomgangatho. Akukho ukuzibophelela kwangaphambili kuyafuneka.
labeling-features-head-4: Nika eyakho idatha yenyani yomhlaba okanye masiyakhe kubhabho.
labeling-features-text-1: Ngaba ufuna ukudibanisa uphononongo lomntu ngqo kwimisebenzi yeshishini lakho? Sinikezela ngokunyaniseka okuphezulu kwe-SLA, amandla aqinisekisiweyo, kunye nee-API ezilula zeREST.
labeling-features-text-2: Iqonga LABANTU lisebenzisa iimodeli zokuzithemba ezibanzi ukwenza uhlalutyo lomgangatho wexesha lokwenyani. Oku kusivumela ukuba sikhawuleze sobabini ubunzima bemibuzo kunye neempendulo ezichanekileyo, zokongela ixesha kunye nemali.
labeling-features-text-3: Azikho zonke iingxaki ezifanayo. Izichazi zemisebenzi ebalulekileyo yokhuseleko inokufuna i-99.99% yokuzithemba kubasebenzi abangabantu ngokupheleleyo. Izichazi zento enye ye-beta kwinkqubo yomdlalo weselfowuni inokufuna ukuzithemba okumodareyithayo. Uyagqiba.
labeling-features-text-4: Ngaba unayo idatha eluhlaza ngaphandle kweseti yokuqinisekisa ebanzi? Kwiimeko ezininzi sinokwakhela enye njengemisebenzi eqhutywa yinkqubo, okanye senze iisampulu ezinelebheli zokuvunywa kwakho.
labeling-info-text-1: Thetha nenye yeengcali zedomeyini yakho ukuchaza iimfuno zeprojekthi yakho: ukuchaneka kokujolisa, ifomathi kunye nazo naziphi na iimfuno ezizodwa.
labeling-info-text-2: Senza umsebenzi omncinci wemveliso ngokusekwe kwidatha yesampulu. Olu vavanyo ngumsebenzi esiwenzileyo kunye ukuqinisekisa ukuba ufumana kanye le nto uyifunayo.
labeling-info-text-3: Ngevolumu yethu ephezulu kunye ne-latency ephantsi siya kuwuguqula umsebenzi wakho ngokukhawuleza, kunye nokuhanjiswa okuzenzekelayo kwakamsinya nje ukuba kwenziwe.
labeling-info-text-4: Njengoko siqonda ngcono iiparameter zomsebenzi wakho wemveliso, iziphumo ziya kuqhubeka ziphucula ngokuhamba kwexesha.
labeling-info-text-5: Iideshibhodi ezibukhoma zikuvumela ukuba unike ingxelo okanye unqumame kwimveliso ngalo naliphi na ixesha.
labeling-main-1c: Ngaba ufuna iilebhile ezingakumbi zeeseti zedatha yakho? I-hCaptcha inikezela ngokukhawuleza, indleko, kunye nomgangatho ophezulu wokubhala idatha kwiinkampani ezisebenza kwi-intelligence yokwenziwa kunye nezicelo zokufunda ngomatshini.
labeling-main-2c: I-hCaptcha inelinye lawona madama makhulu kwiplanethi yakho onokuyisebenzisa. Nokuba lingakanani na inqanaba lakho, sinokuliphatha ngaphandle kokuzibophelela kwangaphambili. Izigidi zemisebenzi ngosuku azinangxaki.
labeling-platform-text: I-hCaptcha yakhelwe kwiqonga labantu, evumela ukuhanjiswa okuphucukileyo kunye nohlalutyo ukuze kunyuswe iindleko kunye nokusebenza kwenyathelo ngalinye. Obu buchwephesha buvumela abasebenzi abalungileyo ukuba baphathe icandelo ngalinye lomsebenzi wakho, bandise ukusebenza kakuhle kweendleko ngelixa kugcinwa imfihlo kunye nokuhlangabezana nazo naziphi na iimfuno zolawulo ezinokuthi zisebenze.
labeling-try-text: ... sikulungele xa uku: inkonzo yethu iyafumaneka ubusuku nemini.
page-acc-faq-1: Umbuzo: Ngaba iCandelo le-hCaptcha 508 + WCAG 2.1 AA liyahambelana? Impendulo: Sikholelwa njalo: bonke abasebenzisi abanalo naluphi na uhlobo lokukhubazeka abakwazi ukukhangela iwebhu kwaye bafake isicatshulwa kwiifom banokufikelela kwiinkonzo ezikhuselwe yi-hCaptcha ekubhaliseni. Nangona kunjalo, eli ayilocebiso lomthetho: kuya kufuneka wenze uvandlakanyo lwakho, uthathele ingqalelo ukuphunyezwa kwakho okukodwa ukuqinisekisa ukuba le yimeko yokuthunyelwa kwakho.
page-acc-faq-2: Umbuzo: Ngaba usebenza kwezinye iinketho zokufikeleleka (a11y), njengomsindo? Impendulo: Iinketho ezithandwayo ngaphambili njengee-captchas zomsindo zicalula abasebenzisi abaninzi be-a11y kwaye zoyiswa ngokulula ngobuchule bokufunda koomatshini banamhlanje. Oku kunyanzelise imiceli mngeni yomsindo yangoku ukuba ibenzima ngakumbi nangakumbi, ukwazisa ingxolo, ixesha elingaqhelekanga, indibaniselwano yamagama engaqhelekanga, njalo njalo ukoyisa abahlaseli. Ke ngoko asinamdla kangako ngale ndlela xa sithelekisa nokuphepha umngeni ngokupheleleyo, kodwa siyakuyiqwalasela ukuba kukho imfuno evela kuluntu lwase-a11y. Nangona kunjalo, sinomdla kakhulu kwiPasi yaBucala yemeko yosetyenziso lokuFikelela. Sikholelwa ukudibanisa indlela yethu yangoku ye-a11y kunye nokukhutshwa kwePasi yoBucala kuya kuvumela abasebenzisi be-a11y ukuba bakhangele ngokukhuselekileyo, bekhuselekile kulwazi lokuba i-traffic yabo iyimfihlo ngakumbi, ngelixa ukuthintela ukusetyenziswa kakubi ngabaqhubi be-bot okwenzeka ngokungenakuphepheka xa kukho iinketho ze-a11y. Singabathathi-nxaxheba abasebenzayo kwiqela elisebenzayo le-IETF elimisela obu buchwepheshe butsha.
page-acc-faq-3: Umbuzo: Kuthekani ngemfihlo? Ngaba ukubhaliswa kuveza i-a11y idatha yokukhangela ngandlela ithile? Wenza ntoni nge-imeyile? Impendulo: I-hCaptcha yenzelwe ubumfihlo ukusuka phantsi. Yahluke kakhulu kuneenketho zakudala ezifana ne-reCAPTCHA ezizezothungelwano lwentengiso, abanenkuthazo yokukulandela kwiwebhu kwaye bakunxulumanise nesazisi sokwenyani. Asize sisebenzise ii-imeyile zofikelelo okanye ulwazi ngayo nayiphi na injongo ngaphandle kokuququzelela ukusetyenziswa kwe-a11y kunye nokuthintela ukuphathwa gadalala. Umgaqo-nkqubo wethu wabucala uneempendulo ezibanzi nezigunyazisiweyo malunga nendlela esisebenzisa ngayo idatha, kodwa impendulo emfutshane yeyokuba asinamdla wokukunxulumanisa njengomntu onembali yakho yokukhangela iincwadi. Sikwasebenza ngoku kwisisombululo se-cryptographic ukulahla ngokukhawuleza idilesi yakho ye-imeyile. ngelixa sigcina amandla ethu okuthintela uxhatshazo, sincedisa umsebenzi wethu wePasi yaBucala.
page-acc-link-1: Ukuba ungumsebenzisi ofikelelekayo, nceda ubhalise apha.
page-acc-subhead: Ukuqinisekisa ukufikelela okungagungqiyo kubo bonke abasebenzisi ngelixa kugcinwa ukhuseleko
page-acc-summary-contents-1: I-hCaptcha yenzelwe ukumisa ii-bots ngokuzahlula ebantwini. Iimvavanyo ezibonakalayo zisisixhobo esilungele oku, kodwa ayinguye wonke umntu unokusombulula umngeni obonakalayo. Ngesi sizathu siyile enye indlela elula, engenantlungu yokuvumela abapapashi abasebenzisa inkonzo yethu bagcine ukufikeleleka komntu wonke ngokuthobela iCandelo 508 kunye neWCAG 2.1 AA.
page-acc-summary-contents-2: Isebenza njani: okokuqala, umsebenzisi uyafikeleleka asayine kule URL, edityaniswe kwiphepha hCaptcha lewijethi yolwazi. Banikwa ikuki ebhalwe ngokufihlakeleyo enokusetyenziswa amaxesha ngamaxesha ngemini, kodwa kufuneka ihlaziywe rhoqo emva kweeyure ezingama-24 ngokungena ngemvume.
page-acc-tr-body:
Umbuzo: Ndisabona umceli mngeni emva kokubeka ikuki. Yintoni ebangela oku?
Impendulo: Oku kuhlala kungenxa yokusebenzisa isibhlisi sentengiso esandayo okanye ulwandiso lwecookie, okanye useto oluvimba ikuki enqamlezileyo, kule meko ikuki ye hcaptcha.com esetiweyo okanye ekhangelwe yi hCaptcha JS kwindawo eyahlukileyo , njengale uyityelelayo.

I-cookies zokufikelela kwi-hCaptcha zisebenza nazo zonke iibrawuza ezithandwayo kunye neebhlokhi zentengiso kuseto lwazo oluqhelekileyo, ngenxa yoko ukusilela kubangelwa zizikripthi ezichasene ne-anti-adblock okanye imigaqo-nkqubo efanayo ejolise kwiindawo ezithile.

Izisombululo:

1. IWhitelist hcaptcha.com kunye * .hcaptcha.com cookies kwi-ad blocker yakho okanye kulwandiso lokhuselo lwebrawuza.
2. Ukuba usebenzisa isikhangeli esinesibindi, esingabonakali njengamanje sinalo naluphi na uluhlu olumhlophe lwecookie, yiya kukhetho -> Shields -> Cookies kwaye ukhethe Vumela Zonke iiKuki.
3. Ukuba usebenzisa ingxelo yakutshanje yeSafari kuyo nayiphi na i-OS X 10.15 okanye i-iOS 13.4 esandula ukukhutshwa, iApple itshintshe nje isimilo seSafari esinxulumene neicookies zomntu wesithathu, ibathintela zonke ngokungagqibekanga. Sisebenzisa isisombululo, kodwa okwangoku nceda undwendwele uKhetho lweSafari, icandelo labucala, kwaye ungakhangeli ukulandela umkhondo weWebhusayithi: Thintela ukulandelela indawo enqamlezileyo ukuze ikuki yokufikeleleka isebenze njengoko kulindelekile.

Umbuzo: Ndisebenzisa izixhobo ezininzi. Ngaba kufuneka ndibhalise amatyeli amaninzi?
Impendulo: Hayi. Nceda ucofe kwikhonkco elifanayo lokungena kwi-imeyile elithunyelwe kuwe kwisixhobo ngasinye osisebenzisayo ukuseta ikuki.

Umbuzo: Ndingazikhusela njani ekulandeleleni ii-cookie zomntu wesithathu ngelixa ndisebenzisa i-cookie yokufikelela?
Impendulo: Usebenzisa nabuphi na ubumfihlo okanye ulwandiso oluvimba intengiso oluxhasa ubumhlophe kwinqanaba le-domain (umz.Block Origin) liza kusebenza njengoko kulindelwe: qiniseka nje ukuba whitelist hcaptcha.com.
page-acc-tr-title: Kubasebenzisi abaFikelelayo: Imibuzo rhoqo kunye neSikhokelo sokuJonga iingxaki
page-acc-tr2-body:
Safari
Ukwenza ii-cookies kwi-Safari (Mac): Yiya kwimenyu ehlayo yeSafari. Khetha Okuthandayo. Cofa imfihlo kwiphaneli ephezulu. Phantsi ko 'Vimba ii-cookies' khetha ukhetho 'Ungaze.'
Ukwenza ii-cookies kwi-Safari (i-iPhone / i-iPad iOS 11+): vula useto lwakho. Skrolela ezantsi kwaye ukhethe i-Safari. Phantsi koBucala noKhuseleko, cima 'Thintela ukuTrekhwa kweSiza esiNqamlezileyo' kwaye 'Vimba zonke iiKuki'

IFirefox
Cofa kwikhaka ngasekhohlo kwebar yedilesi nakweyiphi na iphepha lewebhu. Cofa kwiiSetingi zoKhuseleko. Iphaneli yokuKhetha uKhuseleko kwaBucala noKhuseleko iya kuvula. Phantsi koKhuselo lokuKhangelwa okuPhuculweyo, khetha iSiko. Khetha ukuba yeyiphi iitracker kunye nezikripthi oza kuzithintela ngokukhetha ezi bhokisi zitshekishayo. Qinisekisa ukuba uvule i-hcaptcha.com.

Unokucima okwethutyana ukhuseleko kuMasiko ukulungisa le ngxaki, ngokukhetha iibhokisi zokukhangela: Ungakhethi ibhokisi yokukhangela okanye ukhethe ibhokisi yeeKuki ukuba usenemicimbi.

ugoogle Chrome
Google Chrome (PC)
Khetha i-icon yemenyu ye-Chrome. Khetha Useto.
Yiya kuBucala noKhuseleko, emva koko iiKuki kunye nenye idatha yendawo.
Qinisekisa ukuba 'Vimba ii-cookies zomntu wesithathu' azenziwanga.

Google Chrome (Mac):
Vula ukhetho lwe-Chrome kwibar yemenyu.
Yiya kuBucala noKhuseleko, emva koko iiKuki kunye nenye idatha yendawo.
Qinisekisa ukuba 'Vimba ii-cookies zomntu wesithathu' azenziwanga.

Google Chrome (Android):
Kwisixhobo sakho se-Android, vula usetyenziso lweChannel.
Ekunene phezulu, thepha Okuninzi kwaye emva koko Useto.
Cofa useto lweSiza kunye neeKuki.
Ecaleni kwe 'Cookies,' tshintsha useto l on.
Jonga ibhokisi ecaleni 'Vumela ii-cookies zomntu wesithathu.'

Internet Explorer
1. Khetha igiya kwikona ephezulu ngasekunene kwesikrini, emva koko ukhethe 'Iinketho ze-Intanethi'. Ukuba uneMenyu yeMenyu enikwe amandla, unokukhetha 'Izixhobo' emva koko 'Khetha i-Intanethi'.
2. Cofa kwindawo ethi 'Ubumfihlo'.
3. Khetha iqhosha 'eliPhambili'.
4. Phantsi 'kweeKhukhi zomntu wesithathu' khetha 'Yamkela'.
5. Cofa 'Kulungile'
priv-hc-text: Iinethiwekhi zentengiso zikubona njengemveliso yazo. Asazi. Asikhathali ukuba ngoobani abasebenzisi, kuphela amathuba okuba babe nobubi. Siyawaxhasa amanyathelo anje ngePasi yaBucala, kwaye sisebenza nzima ukulinganisa ubumfihlo nokhuseleko.
reporting-bugs-accessibility-text: Ngaba unengxaki yokubona okanye awukwazanga ukuyigqiba i-hCaptchas?
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-1: Inyathelo 1: Vula izixhobo zoPhuculo (Oku kuqala ukurekhoda iseshoni.)
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-2: Inyathelo 2: Cofa kwiNethiwekhi ithebhu kwizixhobo zonjiniyela. Jonga ibhokisi yokuma ephezulu kwiPistist.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-3: Inyathelo lesi-3: ndwendwela https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, okanye iwebhusayithi onengxaki kuyo (Inqaku labucala: kuphela ukuba awunangxaki nokwabelana ngento eyiyo) ... kwaye emva koko ucofe i I iqhosha lomntu, kwaye uzame ukusombulula.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-4: Inyathelo 4: Cofa i-HAR emva kokuba uzame ukusombulula, kwaye ukhethe Gcina Konke njenge-HAR ukugcina ilogi yenethiwekhi. Thumela loo fayile kuthi.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-5: Inyathelo 5: Cofa kwiConsole ithebhu, kwaye ucofe ekunene emva koko ukhethe konke kwaye ugcine oko kwifayile yokubhaliweyo, ukugcina i-console yelog. Sithumele nathi ngokunjalo.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-6: Isinyathelo sokugqibela: Thumela i-imeyile ye-HAR kunye neefayile zelogi ye-console kuthi, kwaye uchaze ingxaki Sebenzisa: support@hcaptcha.com (nceda usebenzise inkonzo efana neDropbox okanye iFayilebin kwaye uthumele amakhonkco) kunye nokuzikhethela umfanekiso weskrini, ukuba ukrokrela ukuba kukho into engabonisi ngokuchanekileyo. . Nceda uthumele iIP oyisebenzisayo nawe. Ungayifumana ku-https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Enkosi ngokuthatha ixesha lokusinceda sifumane olu lwazi! Sizimisele ukwenza i-hCaptcha isebenze kakuhle kumntu wonke.

Sebenzisa: support@hcaptcha.com (nceda usebenzise inkonzo efana neDropbox okanye iFayilebin kwaye uthumele amakhonkco) kunye nokuzikhethela umfanekiso weskrini, ukuba ukrokrela ukuba kukho into engabonisi ngokuchanekileyo. Nceda uthumele iIP oyisebenzisayo nawe. Ungayifumana ku-https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Enkosi ngokuthatha ixesha lokusinceda sifumane olu lwazi! Sizimisele ukwenza i-hCaptcha isebenze kakuhle kumntu wonke.
reporting-bugs-guide-text-1: Ukuthumela ulwazi lokulungisa ingxaki nengxelo yakho kuya kwenza kube lula kakhulu kuthi ukuba sichaze okwenzekayo. Nantsi imiyalelo yenyathelo ngenyathelo:
reporting-bugs-guide-text-2: Ukuba ungumphuhlisi wewebhu okanye umsebenzisi oyingcali, isishwankathelo singathanda ukuba usithumelele inethiwekhi yokurekhoda i-HAR kunye ne-browser console logs. Nceda uzame ukukhubaza nayiphi na i-ad blocker okanye izongezo zokhuseleko lomkhangeli kuqala kwaye uzame kwakhona phambi kokuba uhambe kula manyathelo. Ukuba oko kulungisa ingxaki yakho, singathanda ukuba usazise ngoguqulelo lwesikhangeli sakho, i-ad blocker okanye ibrowser eyongeziweyo, kunye ne-URL yewebhusayithi.
reporting-bugs-intro-head: Ufumene ibug? Nantsi indlela yokunika ingxelo.
reporting-bugs-intro-text: Izigidi zabantu zisebenzisa i-hCaptcha inyanga nenyanga, kumawakawaka ngokudityaniswa kwezikhangeli, izandiso, izixhobo, ii-firewall, nokunye. Injongo yethu kukuqinisekisa ukuba ihlala isebenza kuwe, ke siyazibulela kakhulu iingxelo zakho! Ukunika ingxelo ekhawulezileyo, cofa nje kwiqhosha lokuthumela ingxelo. Ukuba ubona umba osebenzayo, nceda ulandele imiyalelo yokungena kwe-debug ye-Chrome okanye imiyalelo ye-log yokulungisa i-Firefox engezantsi. Nazo naziphi na ezinye iibrawuza zisithumelele i-imeyile. Kwimicimbi yezokhuseleko okanye imicimbi yabucala, jonga imiyalelo engezantsi.
reporting-bugs-privacy-text: Asikhathali ukuba ngoobani abasebenzisi, kuphela amathuba okuba babe nobubi okanye oomatshini. Siyawaxhasa amanyathelo anje ngePasi yaBucala, kwaye sisebenza nzima ukulinganisa ubumfihlo nokhuseleko. Ukuba ufumene umba ocinga ukuba unokuchaphazela ubumfihlo bomsebenzisi, nceda usithumelele i-imeyili ku support@hcaptcha.com.
reporting-bugs-provide-feedback-text: Siyalibulela igalelo lakho. Sazise nayiphi na imiba kwaye siza kuyisombulula ngokukhawuleza.
reporting-bugs-security-text: Sisoloko sinomdla wokufumana iingxelo zezokhuseleko. I-imeyile support@hcaptcha.com & CC security@hcaptcha.com kwaye siza kubuyela kuwe ngokukhawuleza. Sineprogram ye-bug bounty yeengxelo ezifanelekileyo zokukhusela kwinkonzo ye-hCaptcha kunye nekhowudi yomthombo ohambelanayo.
sales-interstitial-c2b: Yongeza i-hCaptcha yaBapapashi kwiwebhusayithi yam okanye usetyenziso
sec-hc-text: I-hCaptcha igxile kumshicileli. Sisebenzela ukunika iisayithi idatha yokwenyani kwaye sibavumele benze isigqibo malunga nendlela yokuyisebenzisa. Ukuchaneka kunomdla wakho kunye nowethu. Ezinye ii-captchas zibonelelwa ziinkampani zentengiso. Yonke ibhothi abayivimbayo inokunciphisa ingeniso yabo.
signup-interstitial-c1b: Yongeza i-hCaptcha yaBapapashi kwiwebhusayithi yam okanye usetyenziso
support-interstitial-c2d: Funda ngakumbi malunga nokunika ingxelo ngemiba yesoftware
what-is-hcaptcha-text: I-hCaptcha inceda iinkonzo zakho zewebhu ozithandayo ukugcina i-bots, ugaxekile kunye nokuxhatshazwa ngokubuza imibuzo elula elula ebantwini kwaye inzima koomatshini.
why-hc-text: Qho xa uphendula umngeni, sisebenzisa iimodeli ezinobunkunkqele ukufumanisa ukuba ungumntu okanye ungumatshini. Iwebhusayithi oyindwendweleyo emva koko isebenzisa esi siphumo ukunceda ukuphucula amava akho kwindawo yabo ngokugcina i-bots.
